bach.SeriesAbstractNumeric.quantile¶

SeriesAbstractNumeric.quantile(partition=None, q=0.5)[source]¶

When q is a float or len(q) == 1, the resultant series index will remain In case multiple quantiles are calculated, the resultant series index will have all calculated quantiles as index values.

Parameters

  • partition (Union[GroupBy, DataFrame]) – The partition or window to apply

  • q (Union[float, List[float]]) – A quantile or list of quantiles to be calculated
